Adjust negative pressure.sentence: The clinician prepares the negative pressure device by ensuring it is clean and functioning properly.
Adjust negative pressure.subject: The clinician

Adjust negative pressure.sentence: The clinician assesses the patient's wound to determine the appropriate settings for the negative pressure therapy.
Adjust negative pressure.subject: The clinician

Adjust negative pressure.sentence: The clinician applies the dressing around the wound and connects it to the negative pressure device.
Adjust negative pressure.subject: The clinician

Adjust negative pressure.sentence: The clinician sets the negative pressure levels according to the treatment plan.
Adjust negative pressure.subject: The clinician

Adjust negative pressure.sentence: The clinician monitors the patient's response to the therapy and makes adjustments as necessary.
Adjust negative pressure.subject: The clinician
